description:
Event Planner - $50,000 + Benefits + PTO - US Remote (West Coast Hours)


About the company:

My client, a Global Travel and Events Company, is growing their events team! This company promises a fulfilling career path, a welcoming work environment with ample opportunities for growth, and a comprehensive benefits package. With ambitious growth initiatives underway, you will play a pivotal role in supporting their clients.


Responsibilities:

  • Help to develop and implement strategic plans to meet the client's diverse event activity requests across multiple locations in the United States
  • Handle all administrative tasks related to event planning, including budget management, contracts, and documentation
  • Source and coordinate a variety of activities and experiences tailored to the client's event requests, ensuring high-quality service and satisfaction
  • Liaise with vendors and service providers to negotiate contracts and secure the best options for the client's events


Requirements:

  • Proven experience in planning diverse events
  • Experience with Cvent highly regarded
  • 2+ years of current event planning experience
  • Self-motivated with a positive and enthusiastic demeanor.
  • Effective client-facing and presentation abilities


If you are keen to discuss the details further, please apply today or send your cv to Nastasija at COREcruitment dot com
